author: hship
msg: Don't use -n option with echo, since it isn't supported under Solaris.

author: hship
msg: Allow static bindings to be pooled the same as field bindings.
Make the Rollover component only emit a "name" attribute if it is dynamic
(i.e., has both an image and a focus and responds to mouse overs).  It was emitting an empty name attribute.

author: hship
msg: Change the behavior of Forms and Form components slightly, such that it is possible
to write more sophisticated JavaScript event handlers.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
